html:
HEALTHCARE

Demophorius Team

THE “A” TEAM

“A” goes for amazing. Demophorius team is going to amaze you. You will be supported in any way in order to achieve your goal. You will be served and treated with absolute perfection and professionalism, like you have never been before. We develop the strongest and the most trustful relationships that will last through years. It is a win-win situation and that is how it should be for both sides.

Qualified experience

Description: Demophorius manufacturing facilities have been selected to satisfy international quality control standards, while quality is assured by the TUV SUD product service GmbH ISO 13485 and EC certification. Our customer-centered approach to product development is reinforced by listening and understanding our customers’ needs.

FILTER DEPARTMENTS:
Filter departments
Apply filters
Close
  • GENERAL MANAGER
    SAKIS PAPASPYROU
    EMAIL:
    sakis@demophorius.com
    GENERAL MANAGER
    SAKIS PAPASPYROU
    He has been crafting a strategic vision for Demophorius. He has been building Demophorius company image by collaborating with customers and health authorities worldwide as well as with Demophorius employees, and by applying ethical business practices. On a daily basis he is in charge of planning, coordination and direct business operations to ensure the achievement of company goals. In general, he is the A to Z for the company.
  • DEPUTY MANAGER & SALES EXECUTIVE
    KIPROULA VARELLA
    EMAIL:
    kiproula@demophorius.com
    DEPUTY MANAGER & SALES EXECUTIVE
    KIPROULA VARELLA
    She may seem shy and does not talk much, but in her case, less is more. Kiproula is the deputy manager and has more than a decade of experience in sales and promotion of Demophorius products. She represents Demophorius at international exhibitions. Her key sales areas are Middle East and Asia.
  • LOGISTICS OPERATOR
    GEORGIA ANTONIADES
    EMAIL:
    georgia@demophorius.com
    LOGISTICS OPERATOR
    GEORGIA ANTONIADES
    Georgia has a solution for everything that comes to her attention during the whole logistics process: in air and sea shipments or ground transport. She is the sweetheart of the company, always “on-time” and ready to support our partners and clients.
  • OFFICE ADMINISTRATOR
    NITSA PAPASPYROU
    EMAIL:
    nitsa@demophorius.com
    OFFICE ADMINISTRATOR
    NITSA PAPASPYROU
    Nitsa has a genuine spirit, being “Mother Teresa” of Demophorius as she takes care of all people and practicalities in the company –in all her many tasks she is always the same modest, straightforward and helpful person.
  • LOGISTICS MANAGER
    MARIA NICOU
    EMAIL:
    maria@demophorius.com
    LOGISTICS MANAGER
    MARIA NICOU
    Maria cannot be described through simple words. A spectacular woman with infinite knowledge in her field, she constantly gets things done when, where and how they are supposed to be done. She constantly works for the smoothest flow of the Logistics department.
  • SALES MANAGER
    STAVROS PAIS
    EMAIL:
    stavros@demophorius.com
    SALES MANAGER
    STAVROS PAIS
    Stavros has a long term experience in sales and promotion of medical devices manufactured by Demophorius. He may close a “deal” with minor effort, owing to years of experience and “intrinsic sales gut feeling”. He supervises sales team, ensuring excellent customer support and keeping good relationship with customers worldwide. His key sales areas are Latin America and Europe.
    • communication
      8 speaking languages
    • professionals’ education
      PhD
  • FINANCIAL CONTROLLER
    DEMOS PETEVIS
    EMAIL:
    demos@demophorius.com
    FINANCIAL CONTROLLER
    DEMOS PETEVIS
    Demos is the “Professor” of the financial and accounting world. He has an excellent sense of humour, but when it comes to work, he is deeply serious. All the numbers and estimates “pass through his hands” and that is the utmost thing for Demophorious and our partners. Needless to say, his comments often include “could have come closer to this year’s sales target”.
  • SALES EXECUTIVE
    POLIVIOS POLIVIOU
    EMAIL:
    polivios@demophorius.com
    SALES EXECUTIVE
    POLIVIOS POLIVIOU
    Polivios is a really trustworthy and honest person as well as the most supportive salesman. You can just rely on him, let him do his own things and then be stunned by the outcome. His key sales area is Africa.
  • MENA Region Manager
    NADA YASSINE
    EMAIL:
    nada@demophorius.com
    MENA Region Manager
    NADA YASSINE
    Sales means Nada and Nada means sales. An extraordinary woman that was born to succeed and flourish in every aspect of her life. She is the Sales Manager of Middle East and North Africa areas.
  • REGULATORY AFFAIRS MANAGER
    ROMANA NOVAKOVIC
    EMAIL:
    romana@demophorius.com
    REGULATORY AFFAIRS MANAGER
    ROMANA NOVAKOVIC
    Romana has a consultative mindset and identifies regulatory affair needs and seeks to tailor solutions that fit those needs. Her key area of work is clinical evaluation of medical devices and she is the assistant quality manager in daily operations.
  • ACCOUNTANT
    CHARIKLEIA MOUSKOU
    EMAIL:
    chariklia@demophorius.com
    ACCOUNTANT
    CHARIKLEIA MOUSKOU
    Charikleia easily takes on new and exciting challenges in an enjoyable environment of Demophorius, as she says. The company’s staff is fond of her. There is a feeling of intimacy with everyone, as if she had been there forever. Her scope of work involves accounting and financial records.
  • REGULATORY AFFAIRS OFFICER
    MARIOS PRODROMOU
    EMAIL:
    marios@demophorius.com
    REGULATORY AFFAIRS OFFICER
    MARIOS PRODROMOU
    Marios is responsible for the company's operating procedures. He helps to develop company policies concerning how the business operates. He is young, ambitious, energetic and always on alert.
